Lolli Attack

  • Lolli Attack - The Chess Website

Desc:

The Lolli Attack is an aggressive opening for white in the Italian game when black defends with the two knights defense. Instead of immediately sacrificing the knight on f7, white instead plays d4, sacrificing another pawn and then castling kingside. 1. e4 e5 2. Nf3 Nc6 3. Bc4 Nf6 4. Ng5 d5

  • Lolli Attack - Chess Pathways

Desc:

To initiate the Lolli Attack, white delays the well-known piece sacrifice (6. Nxf7 Kxf7 7. Qf3+) in favor of blowing open more lines in the center with 6. d4. In my analysis of the resulting lines, I struggled to find a way for black to obtain a playable position! Letâ€™s take a look at blackâ€™s various attempts to play against the Lolli Attack.
